articles.description: A sideline-clearing brawl erupted on Tuesday during the Eagles and Colts joints practice in Indiana, which resulted in the training camp session coming to a premature ending.
articles.content:
Tensions flared during Tuesday's joint practice between the Philadelphia Eagles and Indianapolis Colts. 
Five-time All-Pro center Jason Kelce blindsided Zaire Franklin at the end of a play, which ap… [+2298 chars]

articles.author: Jill Martin, Wayne Sterling
articles.title: James Harden fined by NBA over 'public trade demands' - CNN
articles.description: The NBA announced Tuesday it has fined Philadelphia 76ers guard James Harden $100,000 for what the league is calling “public trade demands.”
articles.content:

articles.author: Almiya White
articles.title: Father of Titans CB Caleb Farley dies in explosion at family’s Lake Norman home - WSOC Charlotte
articles.description: The father of Tennessee Titans Cornerback Caleb Farley died Tuesday morning after a reported explosion leveled Farley’s house near Lake Norman in Mooresville.
